page.title: 11HOW PEOPLE LIVE
page.content: People in Oulton Broad don't smoke and most of them aren't joined to clubs. Most people didn't spend time on higher education.People go to church about once or twice a year.Alot of people go to live entertainment.Some people do participate in sport and some don't.A typical day of a person in Oulton Broad is:Get up,have breakfast,go to work, come back,tidy up,spend some time on hobbies and watch television.Most people in Oulton Broad have automatic washing machines,deep freezes, telephones and toasters.They have a holiday once a year.They want sun and excitement on their holiday.Most people keep domestic pets.Most would like an indoor swimming pool in Oulton Broad. People spend less than a quarter of total money on shopping in the area.
